name: GMail Redesigned-Grays and Blues (Gmail 3 Update)
description:
This script is based on the amazing work of - http://userstyles.org/styles/4538  (GMail 2.0 Redesigned - Grays and Blues)
I changed few lines to adjust it to the new Gmail version.
It works great combined with the new 'Shiny' theme. (a Gmail built-in theme)

without irreconcilability,
I'm also using:
- http://userstyles.org/styles/3958 (Gmail *2* small attachment icons)
- http://userstyles.org/styles/1513 (Google - Hide Username)
- http://userstyles.org/styles/13134 (Change the Hover color)
